column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I went here with my family for my parent's 33rd wedding anniversary and I was a bit disappointed. I definitely dug the Boardwalk Empire feel of the restaurant
column4: but two steaks came out well done
column5: when they were ordered medium rare and rare. With all the great steak houses in Chicago
column6: there are definitely a lot of Â better options.
